title: Bloomberg Markets: Smarason on Genomic Data Platform
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Smarason on Genomic Data Platform
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Hannes Smarason CEO WuXi Nextcode Discussing building a global genomic data platform for faster diagnosis and treatment of medical conditions.
